name: OB_HSB_DEL_EPISIO
description: This table contains information about any episiotomies performed to aid the delivery for this pregnancy.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the episode record (HSB .1).

columns.name: OB_DEL_EPISIO_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the category value for any episiotomies performed  to aid the delivery for this pregnancy.
